panel.name: body
panel.component:
Saas WCM Platforms
A Reference for the Rennder Platform

Saas is an acronym which means Software As A Service. Saas platforms charge its users a fee to use the platform.

Saas WCM is a Web Content Management platform that allows users to build and maintain their own web sites visually, through a web-based interface. A Saas WCM platform and all of the web sites built within the platform is hosted on web servers leased or owned by the company that owns the platform.
